Oh, this is for a wedding. I actually have a great selection.

translation.en: We need one minute. Thank you.
Harper, we can keep this from her. We control their phones, e-mails.

translation.en: We're the men behind the curtain. She doesn't have to know.

translation.en: You wanna help Rick cheat on Kirsten?

translation.en: We have faked their entire relationship.

translation.en: Now one thing goes wrong, it's a crime to suddenly work behind the scenes?

translation.en: No.
It was never okay.
But now you're willing... to ruin somebody's life
translation.de: Aber jetzt bist du bereit, ein Leben zu ruinieren,

translation.en: just so you can keep dating some boring girl
translation.de: damit du weiterhin eine Langweilerin daten

translation.en: and work longer hours in a job that does not matter.
Whose life am I ruining? Theirs?
-They had no lives. We gave them lives. -Oh, my God.
translation.de: -Sie haben erst seit uns ein Leben. -Oh, Mann.

translation.en: [chuckles] You're worse than Rick.
Rick is-- He's a selfish, superficial asshole, but he can't help it.
translation.de: Rick ist ein egoistisches Arschloch, aber das ist angeboren.

translation.en: You could be a good person, but you wanna be an asshole.
translation.de: Du bist ein guter Mensch, willst aber ein Arschloch sein.

translation.en: You're so obsessed with getting promoted

translation.en: and becoming Rick. You're choosing to be a piece of shit.
translation.de: und wirst dabei wie Rick. Ein Stück Scheiße.

translation.en: Stop pretending this is some moral dilemma.
You are afraid not to be an assistant anymore.
translation.de: Du fürchtest, keine Assistentin mehr zu sein.

translation.en: That's ridiculous.
Have you written anything with all this free time?
Anything? You finish one article or you just keep planning to?
translation.de: Einen einzigen Artikel, oder planst du ihn immer noch?

translation.en: I think you'd rather run around, getting coffee than sit down,
translation.de: Du rennst lieber rum und bringst Kirsten Kaffee,

translation.en: write something and find out you suck.
I'm telling Kirsten.
The whole truth.
All of it.
No, no, no. I'm sorry. I'm so sorry. That was the--
translation.de: Nein, nein. Tut mir leid. Das war der...

translation.en: You're not under arrest. Put your hands down.
translation.de: Sie sind nicht verhaftet. Arme runter.

translation.en: We need to get the ring off. This happens all the time.
translation.de: Sie müssen den Ring abmachen. Das passiert oft.

translation.en: Not the part where you two collaborate to, like, trick your bosses
translation.de: Also nicht das mit der Intrige, dass Sie Ihre Bosse verkuppeln

translation.en: into dating and then it blows-- I wasn't listening.
translation.de: und die ganze Sache... Ich habe nicht zugehört.

translation.en: -[server] Anyone for cake? -I'll try one.
Uh, I'm sorry to just show up.
-You forgot this. -Thanks. Honestly, you saved me.
If I have to hear another woman talk about
translation.de: Wenn mir noch eine Frau erzählt,

translation.en: how much her nipples changed since giving birth, I'll kill myself.
translation.de: wie schlaff ihr Busen seit der Geburt ist, erschieße ich mich.

translation.en: I swear to God, Harper.
I walked in here with a fiancé, and suddenly, I'm a member of a club.
translation.de: Ich kam als Verlobte hier an und bin jetzt mit im Club.

translation.en: They wanna talk about having kids.
-First, I have to be a stepmother. -I don't think you should be a stepmother.
translation.de: -Erst muss ich Stiefmutter werden. -Das sollten Sie nicht.

translation.en: I don't think you should marry Rick because you don't actually like him.
translation.de: Sie sollten Rick nicht heiraten, weil Sie ihn nicht mögen.

translation.en: -Of course I do. I love him. -No, you don't.
This whole thing, your whole relationship, it's not real.
translation.de: Ihre ganze Beziehung ist nicht real.

translation.en: What are you talking about?
-Rick's assistant and I set you up. -No, you didn't.
We shut down the elevator so you'd meet. The Yankees game,
translation.de: Wir haben den Fahrstuhl gestoppt. Beim Yankees-Spiel

translation.en: I got you on the Kiss Cam. And when you guys broke up...
translation.de: steckten wir hinter der Kiss Cam. Und als Schluss war,

translation.en: we told him what to say.
Nantucket, the flowers, that was us. We made you think you liked each other.
translation.de: Nantucket, die Blumen, alles wir. Damit Sie sich verlieben.

translation.en: You don't know this guy. You don't like him. What you feel for him, it's not real.
translation.de: Sie kennen und mögen den Mann nicht. Ihre Gefühle sind nicht echt.

translation.en: You have no idea what is real.
translation.de: Du weißt nicht, was das ist.

translation.en: You think you understand the intimacy of a relationship?

translation.en: You're 25. I don't care how it started.
translation.de: Du bist 25. Egal, wie es begann.

translation.en: -He doesn't see you. He-- -Stop...
talking.
You're fired.
What?
Get out.
Tickets booked?
Uh... Yeah. Yes.
They are.
For the wedding.
-[woman] Kirsten Stevens' office. -You don't wanna talk,
-but hear me out. -Who is this?
I'm covering Kirsten's desk. Can I help you?
translation.de: Ich arbeite für Kirsten. Kann ich helfen?

translation.en: No.
Thank you.
Coming to drinks later?
We thought the market cap was overvalued.
We looked at college towns, and surprisingly...
You gotta be better.
This is not working.
♪ Sometimes I wonder If you're better off ♪
Mom, it turns out touring wedding venues is so much more fun than touring colleges,
because of all the free food and booze out--
Oh, I gotta call you back.
Oh, my God.
It is like a tornado hit a Chinese--
translation.de: Als hätte ein Tornado die chinesische...

translation.en: Hey, are you okay?
Why are you not at work? Harper.
translation.de: Warum bist du nicht bei der Arbeit? Harper.

translation.en: Because I got fired.
Really?
That's amazing.
Congratulations.
Right?
Are you okay?
I spent so much time there.
And I never wrote a single article.
Now Kirsten hates me.
And she'll never help me.
I'm bad at this. I've been trying to write the same article
translation.de: Ich versage. Ich versuche seit Monaten,

translation.en: for months, Becca.
And it's so bad I can't finish it.
Of course your first draft is gonna be bad.
translation.de: Klar, es ist der erste Entwurf.

translation.en: It's gonna be terrible. Then you know what you do, Harper?
translation.de: Der ist schlecht. Aber weißt du was, Harper?

translation.en: You go back and you make it better.
But you can't make it better until you actually do it.
translation.de: Aber das geht erst, wenn du dich ranmachst.

translation.en: You're not a bad writer yet. Stop feeling sorry for yourself
translation.de: Du bist keine schlechte Autorin. Hör auf mit dem Selbstmitleid

translation.en: and just write something bad.
Yes, Kirsten was mean. But you learned so much from her.
translation.de: Ja, Kirsten war gemein. Aber sie hat dir viel beigebracht.

translation.en: You just never had the time to use it.
translation.de: Du hattest nur nie Zeit, es anzuwenden.

translation.en: And now, bud, you got the time.
So, get off your bony little ass and just do it!
translation.de: Beweg deinen knöchrigen Hintern und leg endlich los!

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay.
I'm gonna write...
the shittiest article ever written.
Yes. It's gonna suck ass. I can't wait to read it.
Okay. I got this.
Okay. Okay. Yes. Okay.
Are you cleaning this up? Are we gonna hire someone?
translation.de: Machst du sauber oder eine Putzfrau?

translation.en: I am not leaving this chair until I write an entire article.
translation.de: Ich stehe nicht auf, bevor der Artikel fertig ist.

translation.en: -Great. That's great news for me. -Can I get some free chips and water?
translation.de: -Toll. Eine gute Nachricht für mich. -Gratis-Chips und Wasser, bitte.

This is where Kim threw Kanye's half-birthday party.
translation.de: Kim hat hier Kanyes Halbgeburtstagsfeier organisiert.

translation.en: Our best table.
This is exciting.
Oh, my God.
This is the best meal I've ever had.

translation.en: The best meal I ever had was a $5 pizza thrown up a fire escape.
translation.de: Meins war eine $5-Pizza, die über die Feuerleiter kam.

translation.en: What?
This sucks.
This whole place sucks.
It smells weird. It's far too quiet.

translation.en: And this steak is delicious. It is not worth $70.
translation.de: Dieses Steak ist lecker, aber keine $70 wert.

translation.en: And you and I, we never talk about anything.
translation.de: Und wir reden nie über etwas.

translation.en: I don't want to wanna be an asshole.

translation.en: You sound insane.
Just eat your steak.
If my 15-year-old self would see me now, he would punch me in the dick.
translation.de: Mein 15-jähriges Ich würde mir jetzt in die Eier treten.

translation.en: I don't wanna do this anymore, Suze.
translation.de: Ich will das nicht mehr, Suze.

translation.en: But you're my backup.
You know what?
Order whatever you want, on me.
What am I doing? You're not my girlfriend anymore. Give me that.

translation.en: I'm not Rockefeller.
Harper. You were right.
We can't let them do this. I'm going to JFK.

translation.en: Meet me at the terminal.
It's the cheap one.
Don't have time. Leaving the coat.
I need a taxi. I gotta get to the airport right now.

translation.en: I gotta stop someone from getting married. Flight leaves in-- Oh.

translation.en: I got, like, four hours.
And we've been to Times Square. What about museums? Should we go to the Met?

translation.en: Do you like beautiful art that makes you re-examine what it means to be human?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Then, yeah. The Met's worth it.
In fact, it may still be open if you go right-- Oh, my God.

translation.en: I did the over-dick-around thing.
Sorry.
Hey. Did I forget something?
Yeah. That you're a bastard.

translation.en: I don't wanna be like you. I'm not gonna be.

translation.en: I don't want the promotion. I quit.
Okay.
Kirsten? Don't marry him.
Do it, honey. Go with the young guy.
Oh, no. No, no.
I mean, she's a very handsome woman. Just--

translation.en: -Not what's going on here. -Charlie. You're fired as fuck.

Kirsten, I know you don't know me, but I know you,

translation.en: And even when she's complaining about you, she's really complimenting you.

translation.en: I know how hard you work and what a badass you are,

You are better.
Oh, my God. Gave myself goose bumps.

translation.en: He's crazy. You realize that?
What's my favorite food?
Your favorite-- It's steak tartare.
It's green curry, you douche-tard.
She likes it medium-spicy from Thai Leaf on Broadway.
translation.de: Normal gewürzt, von Thai Leaf am Broadway.

translation.en: What's my favorite place?
Kiki, I ca-- [clears throat]
This is ridiculous.
Why are we--?
Your name is Kirsten.
Squam Lake, New Hampshire, you douche-tard.
translation.de: Squam Lake, New Hampshire, du Honk.

translation.en: Charlie, I know you're no longer his assistant,
translation.de: Charlie, Sie sind nicht mehr sein Assistent,

translation.de: aber streichen Sie "Hochzeit" aus seinem Kalender.

translation.en: Absolutely.
Are you being serious?
No. Kiki's short for Kirsten.
I finished. I finished.
The whole article.
I finished it.
From beginning to end.
I finished it. I finished the whole thing.

translation.en: You, sir, are a hero and scholar,

translation.en: and are about to receive the greatest tip in the history of the service industry.

translation.en: Technically, I don't have my wallet on me. Tomorrow--

translation.en: Leave this place and never return.

translation.en: [whispers] I did it.
-What do you want? -You live here?
It's disgusting.
Hold up. Hold up, hold up.
I'm sorry. I just--
I need some information on, uh, my wife. My ex-wife.
translation.de: Ich brauche Information über meine Frau. Meine Exfrau.

translation.en: Like what?
I got some written down here. Uh, assorted favorites,
translation.de: Ich habe es notiert. Dinge, die sie mag,

translation.en: as in, uh, favorite foods,
-flowers, clothing-- -Are you serious?
Look, I realize I should know this. But you used to do all this stuff for me.

translation.en: I want her back.
I have an old Kiki file.
-I'll send it over to you. -[exhales]
Thank you. Thank you.
-Yeah. -Thank you.
-I really appreciate this. -Rick.
-You still work for this guy? -Nope.
It's soy. Nice seeing you, Rick.
[Charlie] Bye, Rick.
-Hi. -Oh.
Thank God you're here.
I can't find that piece on lesbian soccer players in Nigeria.
translation.de: Wo ist der Artikel über lesbische Fußballerinnen in Nigeria?

translation.en: Probably in your "deleted" folder.
-I can't find Julie's number. -You made me change it
-to Satan in your contacts. -Come back to work.
What?
You crossed every line ever. I genuinely considered setting you up
translation.de: Du hast alle Grenzen überschritten. Ich denke darüber nach,

translation.en: for white-collar crime and just letting you rot in jail.
translation.de: dich im Gefängnis verrotten zu lassen.

translation.en: But I understand in some ways what you were trying to do.

translation.en: You're my hero.

-I have to get my stuff. This is awkward. -Have you written anything?

translation.en: Have I written anything? Yes. I have written something.

translation.en: It's just-- It's right here.
Let's go over it.
-Tell me something I don't know. -Okay.
-"Twilight Champions." -Yeah, but that title is--
-No, I like it. I love the title. -I like it, too. I could like it.
translation.de: -Mir gefällt er. -Mir auch. Also er könnte mir gefallen.

If I spend too much time on Gilda in the beginning,

Oh, Kirsten told me to meet her. What are you doing here?

-She Cyrano'd us. -Yes, she--

Actually, I'm a temp, which is technically lower

translation.de: also noch weniger als ein Assistent, was ziemlich frustrierend ist.

translation.en: But it's, um, kind of cool. I get to see a bunch of different jobs.
translation.de: Aber es ist auch cool. Ich werde mehrere Jobs ausprobieren

translation.en: Find out what I actually like.
I like you.
So, so much.
You're not hard to get at all.
You're hard to earn.
It's so much better.
You displayed a total lack of character when it mattered.
translation.de: Du hast Charakterlosigkeit bewiesen, als es darauf ankam.

Charlie, you have the romantic and sexual personality of a seventh-grader.

translation.en: What?
You're a know-it-all.
You are unbelievably bad at beer pong.
You're a sore winner. And you use too many exclamation points.

I feel joy.
